get.summary: Validate the mx record setup for the inbound parse functionality

201.description: The layout has been successfully created.

get.description: Returns a list of layouts that can be paginated using the `page` query parameter and filtered by the environment where it is executed from the organization the user belongs to.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page for the pagination

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Size of page for the pagination

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Direction of the sorting query param. Either ascending (1) or descending (-1)

200.description: The list of layouts that match the criteria of the query params are successfully returned.

400.description: Page size can not be larger than the page size limit.

get.description: Get a layout by its ID

200.description: The layout with the layoutId provided exists in the database.

404.description: The layout with the layoutId provided does not exist in the database.

delete.description: Execute a soft delete of a layout given a certain ID.

204.description: The layout has been deleted correctly

404.description: The layout with the layoutId provided does not exist in the database so it can not be deleted.

409.description: Either you are trying to delete a layout that is being used or a layout that is the default in the environment.

patch.description: Update the name, content and variables of a layout. Also change it to be default or no.

200.description: The layout with the layoutId provided has been updated correctly.

400.description: The payload provided or the URL param are not right.

404.description: The layout with the layoutId provided does not exist in the database so it can not be updated.

409.description: One default layout is needed. If you are trying to turn a default layout as not default, you should turn a different layout as default first and automatically it will be done by the system.

post.description: Sets the default layout for the environment and updates to non default to the existing default layout (if any).

204.description: The selected layout has been set as the default for the environment.

404.description: The layout with the layoutId provided does not exist in the database so it can not be set as the default for the environment.

get.summary: Get webhook support status for provider

post.description:
Trigger event is the main (and the only) way to send notification to subscribers. 
    The trigger identifier is used to match the particular template associated with it. 
    Additional information can be passed according the body interface below.

Using this endpoint you can trigger multiple events at once, to avoid multiple calls to the API.
      The bulk API is limited to 100 events per request.

Trigger a broadcast event to all existing subscribers, could be used to send announcements, etc.
      In the future could be used to trigger events to a subset of subscribers based on defined filters.

delete.description:
Using a previously generated transactionId during the event trigger,
     will cancel any active or pending workflows. This is useful to cancel active digests, delays etc...

get.description: Returns a list of subscribers, could paginated using the `page` query parameter

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to fetch, defaults to 0

post.description: Creates a subscriber entity, in the Novu platform. The subscriber will be later used to receive notifications, and access notification feeds. Communication credentials such as email, phone number, and 3 rd party credentials i.e slack tokens could be later associated to this entity.

get.description: Get subscriber by your internal id used to identify the subscriber

put.description: Used to update the subscriber entity with new information

delete.description: Deletes a subscriber entity from the Novu platform

put.description: Subscriber credentials associated to the delivery methods such as slack and push tokens.

patch.description: Used to update the subscriber isOnline flag.

get.summary: Get a notification feed for a particular subscriber
Get the unseen notification count for subscribers feed

post.summary: Mark a subscriber feed message as seen
post.description: This endpoint is deprecated please address /:subscriberId/messages/markAs instead

post.summary: Mark a subscriber feed message as seen

get.description: Returns a list of topics that can be paginated using the `page` query parameter and filtered by the topic key with the `key` query parameter

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page for the pagination

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Size of page for the pagination

post.description: Add subscribers to a topic by key

get.description: Get a topic by its topic key

patch.description: Rename a topic by providing a new name

get.description: Returns a list of messages, could paginate using the `page` query parameter

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel for the messages you wish to list

parameters.name: subscriberId
parameters.description: The subscriberId for the subscriber you like to list messages for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of messages to fetch, defaults to 10

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to fetch, defaults to 0

delete.description: Deletes a message entity from the Novu platform

name.description: User defined custom name and provided by the user that will name the Layout created.

content.description: User defined content for the layout.

variables.description: User defined variables to render in the layout placeholders.

isDefault.description: Variable that defines if the layout is chosen as default when creating a layout.

name.description: User defined custom name and provided by the user that will name the Layout updated.

description.description: User defined description of the layout

content.description: User defined content for the layout.

variables.description: User defined variables to render in the layout placeholders.

isDefault.description: Variable that defines if the layout is chosen as default when creating a layout.

name.description: The trigger identifier of the template you wish to send. This identifier can be found on the template page.

payload.description:
The payload object is used to pass additional custom information that could be used to render the template, or perform routing rules based on it. 
      This data will also be available when fetching the notifications feed from the API to display certain parts of the UI.

overrides.description: This could be used to override provider specific configurations

to.description: The recipients list of people who will receive the notification.

oneOf.description: Unique identifier of a subscriber in your systems

transactionId.description: A unique identifier for this transaction, we will generated a UUID if not provided.

actor.description:
It is used to display the Avatar of the provided actor's subscriber id or actor object.
    If a new actor object is provided, we will create a new subscriber in our system

oneOf.description: Unique identifier of a subscriber in your systems

acknowledged.description: If trigger was acknowledged or not

error.description: In case of an error, this field will contain the error message

name.description: The trigger identifier associated for the template you wish to send. This identifier can be found on the template page.

payload.description:
The payload object is used to pass additional custom information that could be used to render the template, or perform routing rules based on it. 
      This data will also be available when fetching the notifications feed from the API to display certain parts of the UI.

overrides.description: This could be used to override provider specific configurations

transactionId.description: A unique identifier for this transaction, we will generated a UUID if not provided.

actor.description:
It is used to display the Avatar of the provided actor's subscriber id or actor object.
    If a new actor object is provided, we will create a new subscriber in our system

oneOf.description: Unique identifier of a subscriber in your systems

webhookUrl.description: Webhook url used by chat app integrations. The webhook should be obtained from the chat app provider.

deviceTokens.description: Contains an array of the subscriber device tokens for a given provider. Used on Push integrations

_integrationId.description: Id of the integration that is used for this channel

_id.description: The internal id novu generated for your subscriber, this is not the subscriberId matching your query. See `subscriberId` for that

subscriberId.description: The internal identifier you used to create this subscriber, usually correlates to the id the user in your systems

page.description: The current page of the paginated response

totalCount.description: Total count of subscribers matching the query

pageSize.description: Number of subscribers on each page

data.description: The list of subscribers matching the query

subscriberId.description: The internal identifier you used to create this subscriber, usually correlates to the id the user in your systems

avatar.description: An http url to the profile image of your subscriber

providerId.description: The provider identifier for the credentials

credentials.description: Credentials payload for the specified provider

acknowledged.description: A boolean stating the success of the action

status.description: The status enum for the performed action

_id.description: Unique identifier of the notification template

critical.description: Critical templates will always be delivered to the end user and should be hidden from the subscriber preferences screen

enabled.description: Sets if the notification template is fully enabled for all channels or not for the subscriber.

channels.description: Subscriber preferences for the different channels regarding this notification template

template.description: The notification template information and if it is critical or not

preference.description: The preferences of the subscriber regarding the related notification template

type.description: The type of channel that is enabled or not

enabled.description: If channel is enabled or not

channel.description: The subscriber preferences for every ChannelTypeEnum for the notification template assigned.

enabled.description: Sets if the notification template is fully enabled for all channels or not for the subscriber.

payload.description: The payload that was used to send the notification trigger

overrides.description: Provider specific overrides used when triggering the notification

key.description: User defined custom key and provided by the user that will be an unique identifier for the Topic created.

name.description: User defined custom name and provided by the user that will name the Topic created.

subscribers.description: List of subscriber identifiers that will be associated to the topic
List of subscriber identifiers that will be removed to the topic

name.description: User defined custom name and provided by the user to rename the topic.

acknowledged.description: A boolean stating the success of the action

status.description: The status enum for the performed action
